item.description: Get the right kind of music going, it’s time to focus ðŸ˜Ž Brainstorming Link to heading Topic Link to heading %%What is the big idea you’re thinking about? Why are you writing this? %% References Link to heading %%Are there any existing notes, resources, or experiences that come to mind related to the topic? For each thing, why is it related and how can it be helpful? %% Brain Dump Link to heading %% Write out any other thoughts that come to mind, then create a cognitive scaffolding that combines your references and brain dump.
